channel.title: Spawning on death or log in
channel.description:
On my server I got this situation: My server is a pk server. Almost everywhere dangerzone, except for the banks. Lets say a player logs in in edge (outside of the bank). When he logs in he's not in the dangerzone, he should be but you don't see a head on fire. Other players who are in edge (outside of the bank) and in the dangerzone, can't see him either. Only when he tele's to edge, they can see and he see's a head on fire now. So my question is: Is it possible to make people spawn in the dangerzone, along with the other people? And if possible could someone explain it to me please? Btw: My server base is Codeusa, 517.
Thank you

item.title: Spawning on death or log in
item.dc:creator: @robinhopok robinhopok
item.description:
@robinhopok wrote:

Trxkin:

You can’t see him. Because, you guys are pretty much in another world than he is. I have that same thing for my 508.

Sucks, doesn’t it?
Anyone can explain me/us to fix it?
Bump

Read full topic
item.source: Spawning on death or log in

item.title: Spawning on death or log in
item.dc:creator: @hahabob2 hahabob2
item.description:
@hahabob2 wrote:

I’m guessing you have d3v0ns source. Well, on his source you have to type a command or whatever to go into pvp mode, unless you changed it to something else. You would have to add to the log in method that pvp mode is true. If you still have the command, experiment with that, and add part of it to the log in method. I’m pretty sure this was added to stop people from attacking you upon log in.

Read full topic
